name: Last Stand (Nico Padua)
description:
You are the last surviving soldier from your garrison in a city under siege. Fight back the waves of goblins and undead for as long as you can!

Last Stand is a 6 week student project developed by 6 students (Byron Carter, Nico Padua, Max Guilhaus, Callum O'Grady, William Grime

s, Blake Morrison).
